descriptionHtml:
[font=Verdana][color=#87cefa][size=5][b]Perk Point Potion mod for - The Elder Scrolls V Skyrim[/b][/size]

[b]version 1.3[/b][/color] ([color=#32cd32]Last update: 14.Jun.2012[/color])

[color=#87cefa][b]by _DTG_[/b][/color]
[line]
[color=#ff4500][b]ATTENTION!!![/b][/color] If you are updating from Perk Point Potion v1.2.1 or earlier version, uninstall the mod or delete [color=#ffff00]PerkPointPotion.dll[/color] and [color=#ffff00]PerkPointPotion.ini[/color] files from your [color=#ffff00][Skyrim]\Data\SKSE\Plugins[/color] folder.
[line]
--------------------------------------------------
[color=#87cefa][b]Introduction[/b][/color]
--------------------------------------------------
If you have collected a lot of gold and don't know what to buy, this mod will allow you to buy
Perk Point Potions (Elixir of Perk) from Arcadia in Whiterun. The potion increases your Perk Points by one.
Please note that Elixir of Perk is not cheap! Perhaps, this mod can be useful only at late game,
when making money becomes easier than leveling your character.

Probably you will be shocked by the potion price, but note that Skyrim merchants sell everything at triple price. :\
You can get significant discount if you have high Speech level with activated haggling perks,
have Fortify Barter equipment, potions, blessings etc...


--------------------------------------------------
[color=#87cefa][b]Mod Translations[/b][/color]
--------------------------------------------------
[color=#ffff00]Italian translation by Ciccigomma:[/color]
Traduzione italiana disponibile presso Skyrim Chiama Italia: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/62895]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/62895[/url]


--------------------------------------------------
[color=#87cefa][b]Requirements[/b][/color]
--------------------------------------------------
[list][*][color=#ff4500]The Elder Scrolls V Skyrim version 1.6.89.0 or higher.[/color][*]SKSE - Skyrim Script Extender (compatible with your Skyrim version)[url=http://skse.silverlock.org]http://skse.silverlock.org/[/url][*]Nexus Mod Manager (recommended)[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/content/modmanager]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/content/modmanager/[/url][/list]


--------------------------------------------------
[color=#87cefa][b]Installation and Usage[/b][/color]
--------------------------------------------------
Install/uninstall this mod using Nexus Mod Manager.

After installing the mod, make sure it works properly. In the game console type: [color=#ffff00]help "Elixir of Perk" 4[/color]
The result should look something like this: [color=#ffff00]ALCH (xx000D63) 'Elixir of Perk'[/color]
[color=#ffff00]xx[/color] is load order of the plugin, and this number is different for different users. In my game [color=#ffff00]xx = 03 (03000D63)[/color].
After you obtained a valid ID for Elixir of Perk, type: [color=#ffff00]player.additem [ID] [amount][/color]
For example, I type: [color=#ffff00]player.additem 03000D63 5[/color] to get 5 elixirs.
Also, you can go to Arcadia in Whiterun and buy one. If you don't have enough money to buy the elixir, you can type [color=#ffff00]player.additem F 100000[/color] in the console to get 100000 of gold.
Drink the elixir and check if the Perk Points increased. If it's not working, check the FAQ section below.

[color=#87cefa][b]Manual installation:[/b][/color]
[list=1]
[*]Copy [color=#ffff00]PerkPointPotion.esp[/color] file into [color=#ffff00][Skyrim]\Data[/color] folder.
[*]Copy [color=#ffff00]AddPerkPointEffect.pex file[/color] into [color=#ffff00][Skyrim]\Data\Scripts[/color] folder.
[/list]


--------------------------------------------------
[color=#87cefa][b]FAQ[/b][/color]
--------------------------------------------------
[color=#ffa500][b]Q:[/b] I drank the potion but no Perk Points added.[/color]

[b]A:[/b] This usually means that [b]SKSE[/b] is not loaded or not working properly. Do the following:
[list][*]Make sure you're launching [color=#ffff00]skse_loader.exe[/color] and not TESV.exe.[*]Try to start [color=#ffff00]skse_loader.exe[/color] with admin rights.[*]If you have installed [color=#ffff00]Perk Point Potion[/color] mod manually, then try to reinstall it with [color=#ffff00]Nexus Mod Manager[/color].[/list]

[color=#ffa500][b]Q:[/b] Will this mod work with other versions of Skyrim?[/color]

[b]A:[/b] The current version of the mod works with Skyrim v1.6.89.0 and theoretically should work with higher version of Skyrim (future updates), just requires compatible SKSE.

Skyrim v1.4.21 - v1.5.26.0 users can find compatible version in the [color=#ffff00]Files[/color] tab, in [color=#ffff00]OLD VERSIONS[/color] section.


[color=#ffa500][b]Q:[/b] After buying an Elixir of Perk from Arcadia, I can no longer sell anything back to her, she'll happily take my stuff,
but I get no money for it.[/color]

[b]A:[/b] This is [b]NOT[/b] caused by my mod, this is a game bug. As far as I noticed if a vendor has 32768 or more gold, you won't receive any money for selling your stuff.


--------------------------------------------------
[color=#87cefa][b]Version history[/b][/color] ([color=#32cd32]Last update: 14.Jun.2012[/color])
--------------------------------------------------
Version 1.3:
[list][*]Compatibility update for Skyrim 1.6.89.0.[*]No longer uses [color=#ffff00]PerkPointPotion.dll[/color] and [color=#ffff00]PerkPointPotion.ini[/color] files.[/list]

Version 1.2.1:
[list][*]Fixed issue with Elixir of Perk not adding a Perk Point.[/list]

Version 1.2:
[list][*]Compatibility update for Skyrim 1.5.24.[/list]

Version 1.1:
[list][*]Elixir of Perk price increased from 15 000 to 30 000. This is original price. But we know that Skyrim merchants are very greedy, they sell everything with 200% markups. :\[*]Added PerkPointPotionConfig - a program, which allows you to edit the elixir price. You can download it separately.[*]Fixed a minor bug.[/list]

Version 1.0:
[list][*]1.0 - Initial release.[/list]
